author: hollowstrawberry
description: Play Checkers against your friends or the bot, or make bots play against each other. Requires ImageMagick installed on the host machine.
install_msg:
ðŸ”´ __**SimpleCheckers**__
Play Checkers against your friends or the bot, or make bots play against each other. The only variant available right now is English Draughts (also known as American Checkers), but if you want to play a different variant let me know and I might add it.
Only one game may be active per channel, but it works in threads, and inactive games may be ended by any user. Games persist after a bot restart.
```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load simplecheckers
2. Make sure ImageMagick is installed on the bot's host machine: https://imagemagick.org/script/download.php
3. Optionally, enable the slash command with [p]slash enable checkers
  3.1. Then do [p]slash sync
  3.2. Then restart Discord.
4. Start playing with [p]checkers or [p]draughts or /checkers```
short: Play Checkers against your friends or the bot, or make bots play against each other.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
